definitions: the quality or state of being free from error; accuracy

examples.text: there was evidence to support the correctness of the identification

shortDefinitions: quality or state of being free from error

definitions: the quality of being right in an opinion or judgment

examples.text: he is trying to challenge the correctness of his criminal conviction

shortDefinitions: quality of being right in an opinion or judgement

examples.text: the character was played with stuffy correctness

definitions: conformity to a particular political or ideological orthodoxy

examples.text: high-end environmental correctness has a price

shortDefinitions: conformity to particular political or ideological orthodoxy
